name: Mineral Products Association
goal: The MPA represents the UK mineral products industry, including materials and products such as aggregates, asphalt, cement, concrete, industrial sand and lime
interests: Climate Action, Development, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, Internal Market
euInitiatives:
Public affairs
Biodiversity/Natura 2000
Raw Materials/Natural Resources
Waste Framework
Water Framework
Circular Economy
Climate change measures, including EUETS
